attributes.review: when i saw that my favorite president made a app i was so exited because i love trump even if he does have 42 rape allegations. but when i opened the app it immediately glitched and then my phone shut down. a message appeared on the screen saying to look at the package outside of my house. i opened the box and inside was a bag of Cheetos but when i opened the bag instead of Cheetos it had mini trump dolls covered in Cheetos dust. disgusted i naturally threw the bag away and deleted the app but when i got back into my room TRUMP WAS SITTING ON MY BED i yelled at him to get out because he was going to leave a imprint on my bed from his orange tan. he told me to vote trump 2020 but after the terrible experience i has iâ€™m afraid iâ€™m not going to anymore
